info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Oneida and central Madison Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peterboro, or 9 miles south of Oneida, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oneida, Lenox, Sherrill, Morrisville, Stockbridge, Augusta, Nelson, Vernon, Oneida Castle and Wampsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
